attributes.action: Stop taking healthy and friendly pitbull terriers off the streets !
attributes.additional_details:
Instead of putting pitbull dogs down, pull out their teeth.
People kill and go to prison and fed, why should dogs be euthanised and not re-homed !
This needs to stop, have a heart..
It’s someone’s family companion you are killing for most reasons FOR NOTHING !!
attributes.background: Only put a dog down if there human aggressive
